channel.title: Websites or things that just make you smile
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I just want to share a few really good sites that make me smile and laugh (clean humor so its safe for kids).
This ones just great, the stories always make me smile http://www.givesmehope.com
And this ones kinda new but its going to be really big soon, makes me laugh so hard lol http://www.tasteofawesome.com/
Anyone else know a really good site or something that just makes your smile, happy, or laugh? Post them here and discuss but keep it nice :) -Andrew

item.title: Websites or things that just make you smile
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:12, topic:371460”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=467549.msg3418498#msg3418498 date=1291317572]
Omg lmao at http://www.tasteofawesome.com/!
[/quote]
Lmao Ikr, best site ever xD this ones my favorite

[/quote]

Nah, I like the chinese menu one.

Read full topic

item.title: Websites or things that just make you smile
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:5, topic:371460”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=467549.msg3418481#msg3418481 date=1291316050]

yayyyy, dead baby jokes http://www.dead-baby-joke.com/dbj_001.htm

I think you miss the point lol
[/quote]

Nah man, I laughed my face off at some of them, when I first found out about it.

Like, how do you stop a dead baby from crawling around in circles? Nail its other hand down.

etc.[/quote]

So whens your next psychiatrist session?

Read full topic
